casebody.data:
State
v.
Bernard George Lamp, Jr. 222A14-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 27, 2016

Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Sarah M. Kirkman, District Attorney, Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, For Lamp, Bernard George (Jr.).

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File *436Brief filed on the 26th of May 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of May 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 5th day of August 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
